page.title: 09GROBY SUPPORTS CHARITIES.
page.content: Groby and the surrounding villages have joined a community link scheme run by Action Aid.We sponsor a small village in Somalia called Owr Boogeys. Every year for five years we have to raise 2 000 pounds to send to our link village.From this money the village has decided to extend the local school and employ more teachers,thus offering the chance of education to more pupils.In addition a clean water well is being dug and agricultural efficiency improved. To raise money many different events have been staged -a roller disco,Spring and Summer Fayres and a parachute jump being just a few. Frequent newsletters are received from the village and occasionally visits are made by a representative who has been to the community to see the work at first hand.
